mapper.insert: insert into wg_disclosure_info( indv_name, indv_company, indv_cert_type, indv_cert_num, indv_link_number, indv_post_code, indv_address, indv_email, org_name, org_code, org_legal_person, org_link_man, org_link_number, org_post_code, org_address, org_email, apply_date, info_of_gov, info_descriptor, get_info_way, get_info_media, info_usage, info_usage_remark, derate_expenses_reason, key_word, accept_no, apply_type, transfer_no ) values( #{indv_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indv_company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indv_cert_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indv_cert_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indv_link_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indv_post_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indv_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indv_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_legal_person,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_link_man,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_link_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_post_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apply_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{info_of_gov,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info_descriptor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{get_info_way,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{get_info_media,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info_usage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info_usage_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{derate_expenses_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key_word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accept_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apply_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transfer_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
